name: Dragon Strike: Puzzle RPG
description:
Dragon Strike is an epic new match-3 RPG game, blending the best elements of empire building and match-3 with the added element of PvP arena combat!

• BUILD - Create a powerful empire!
• BATTLE - Launch massive Dragon Strikes by generating huge combos!
• SUMMON - Summon hundreds of mighty heroes and dragons!
• LEVEL UP - Upgrade your Empire, Heroes, and Dragons!
• ARENA - Battle players from around the world in epic PvP battles!
• ALLIANCES - Form powerful alliances and climb the global leaderboards!
• FANTASTIC WORLD - Explore a beautiful fantasy world full of dangerous monsters and awesome treasures!

Raise a mighty dragon army and strike now!
